sentences.en: Children should be guaranteed a high - quality and free preschool education.
sentences.cn: 必须保证孩子们能接受到高质量并且免费的学前教育.

sentences.en: Could you tell me something about China's preschool education?
sentences.cn: 你可以给我讲讲中国的学前教育 吗 ?

sentences.en: Courses taught: Child Development, Adolescent development, Preschool Mathematics and Science.
sentences.cn: 任教科目包括儿童心理发展 、 青少年发展 、 学前数学和科学等.

sentences.en: Has missed preschool education this period often the wasted effort.
sentences.cn: 错过了学前教育这一关键期则往往事倍功半.

sentences.en: Influenced by many factors, preschool education in China still falls behind.
sentences.cn: 受各种因素的影响, 我国农村幼儿教育仍很落后.

sentences.en: It is preschool education walks along commercialized contradiction on one hand.
sentences.cn: 一方面是学前教育走市场化的矛盾.

sentences.en: Narration should become a basic approach to preschool education.
sentences.cn: 叙事应是幼儿教育的基本途径.

sentences.en: Only 40 % of 5 - year - olds have access to preschool education.
sentences.cn: 5 岁 孩童中只有40%能享受学前教育.

sentences.en: Preschool children are not ye fully able to distinguish fantasy from reality.
sentences.cn: 学龄前的儿童还不能完全辨别事实与幻想.

sentences.en: Preschool education is as important as nine - year compulsory education.
sentences.cn: 幼儿教育和九年义务制教育一样重要.

sentences.en: Reading can begin with babies and continue throughout the preschool years.
sentences.cn: 阅读可以从婴儿期开始,并继续贯穿于整个学龄期.

sentences.en: The core of preschool educators'specialization is the growth of their specialty.
sentences.cn: 幼儿教师专业化的核心是教师的专业成长.

sentences.en: The preschool teacher pronounced Vicente dyslexic, disorganized, and behind his peers overall.
sentences.cn: 幼儿园的老师说他朗读有障碍,无法集中精力是全幼儿园里最差的孩子.

sentences.en: This kind of toy is meant for preschool children.
sentences.cn: 这种玩具专为学龄前儿童制造的.

sentences.en: Yes, they go to preschool classes at the age of 5.
sentences.cn: 是的, 他们五岁开始上学前班.

trans.tran_cn: 未满学龄的；就学前的，入学前的
trans.tran_en: relating to the time in a child’s life before they are old enough to go to school
a school for children between two and five years of age
